T02D3484:132a-1: ba ra da t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3484:132a-3: mchog sbyin sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3484:132a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3484:132a-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug
T02D3484:132a-6: pa bsgoms nas pam yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs
T02D3484:132a-7: chu skyes kyi dbus su aam yig las skyes pa'i
T02D3484:132a-8: zla ba la t'am yig ljang gu las skyes pa'i
T02D3484:132a-9: sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D3484:132a-10: brgyan pa / phyag g-yon na autpa la bsnams shing g-yas pa mchog sbyin dang ldan pa /
T02D3484:132a-11: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3484:132a-12: g-yas phyogs logs na mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer
T02D3484:132a-13: can ser mo rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cod
T02D3484:132a-14: pan can / g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyag dag gis
T02D3484:132a-15: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga dang ba
T02D3484:132a-17: de bzhin du rma bya chen mo g-yon pa dang
T02D3484:132a-18: cig shos kyi phyag dag gis rma bya'i sgro dang
T02D3484:132a-20: g-yon phyogs logs su ral gcig ma thung zhing gnag pa /
T02D3484:132a-21: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3484:132a-24: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D3484:132a-25: gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3484:132a-26: de bzhin du 'phags ma dug sel ma ljang gu
T02D3484:132a-27: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis sbrul nag
T02D3484:132a-28: po dang rnga yab bsnams pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3484:132a-29: de bzhin du bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3484:132a-30: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a zhes so //
